title: Products (Prescription and Control of Supply) (Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Medicinal Products
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Medicinal Products 

(Prescription and Control of Supply) (Amendment) (No. 3) Regulations 2020. 

(2) The citation “the Medicinal Products (Prescription and Control of 

Supply) Regulations 2003 to 2020” includes these Regulations.

title: Products (Prescription and Control of Supply) (Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations
heading: 2. The Seventh Schedule (as amended by Regulation 2 of the Medicinal
text_raw:
2. The Seventh Schedule (as amended by Regulation 2 of the Medicinal 
Products (Prescription and Control of Supply) (Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations 
2020 (S.I. No. 177 of 2020)) to the Medicinal Products (Prescription and Control 
of Supply) Regulations 2003 (S.I. No. 540 of 2003) is amended by substituting 
the following for the entry for “Methoxyflurane for Inhalation” in each place 
where it occurs: 

“ 

Methoxyflurane for 
Inhalation 

”. 

By inhalation Adults 

and 

children: 

Pain relief 

According to CPG or 
on registered medical 
practitioner’s 
instructions. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

4 June, 2020. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 9th June, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [204] 3

title: Products (Prescription and Control of Supply) (Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Medicinal Products (Prescription and Control of 
Supply) Regulations 2003 to make a change to the list of medicinal products 
which may be supplied to pre-hospital emergency care providers for use by 
advanced paramedics, paramedics and emergency medical technicians. 

These Regulations may be cited as the Medicinal Products (Prescription and 
Control of Supply) (Amendment) (No. 3) Regulations 2020.
